author: bodewig
msg: Made AntClassLoader always add java.* and javax.* to the list of
packages to load via the system classloaders.
This fixes the problem reported by Erik Meade <emeade@geekfarm.org>.

author: glennm
msg: Throws BuildException if it tries to resolve a path which
will go further up than the root of the file-system.

author: bodewig
msg: Synced the documentation for <javac> with the implementation.

author: bodewig
msg: Make the system call a little bit more secure.
